definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: For comparision, the results obtained by EDC-method were also given.
sentences.chinese: 为了比较，也给出了用有效介电常数法所得的结果。

sentences.english: In wide temperature range the double-peak of dielectric constant appears.
sentences.chinese: 在很宽的温度范围内出现了双介电常数峰。

sentences.english: There is the permittivity vacuum. It is all up there.
sentences.chinese: 这儿还有真空中的介电常数，看，全在这里。

sentences.english: In chapter two, the quantitative evanescent microwave microscopy of the dielectric constant of thin films using a recursive image charge approach is described.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是近场微波显微术对薄膜介电常数的定量表征。

sentences.english: The effective constitutive parameters of forests at high frequency range is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了森林的高频有效导磁率和有效介电常数。

sentences.english: The dielectric constant of a-C:F films is composed mainly of electron polarization and increases with increasing R.
sentences.chinese: 薄膜的介电常数取决于电子极化并随R的增大而上升。

sentences.english: Relative permittivity of Fe powders is adjusted by adding different Al2O3 concentration.
sentences.chinese: 通过加入铁中的氧化铝含量可以调节铁的复介电常数。

sentences.english: This paper mainly studies the microwave permittivity measurement techniques of dielectric materials.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了微波介质材料介电常数的测试方法。

sentences.english: High dielectric constant thin films have been used in high-density dynamic random access memories widely.
sentences.chinese: 高介电常数薄膜广泛应用于动态随机存储器中。

sentences.english: A cascade network decomposition method for measuring the complex dielectric constant of mushy materials is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了测量糊状物质复介电常数的级联网络分解法。

sentences.english: At last, the development trends of the microwave ceramics with low permittivity are indicated.
sentences.chinese: 最后展望了低介电常数微波介质陶瓷今后的发展方向。

sentences.english: In this thesis, we report the dielectric constants of different semiconductors.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中，我们报告了不同的半导体的介电常数。

sentences.english: This paper derived the relations between polarization dispersion and wave length from the dielectric constant perturbation theory.
sentences.chinese: 本文从介电常数微扰理论得到极化色散与波长的关系。

sentences.english: Epsilon zero is the permittivity of vacuum.

definition: grid (in vacuum tubes)/gate (terminal of a field-effect transistor)
